name: Healthcare Provider - Transforming Patient Services with Health Cloud
description: Implementation of a robust Patient Services platform using Salesforce Health Cloud, enabling seamless patient profile management, automated care workflows, and real-time patient interactions while ensuring compliance with healthcare standards.
challenge: The healthcare provider faced multiple critical challenges: disjointed patient data with no unified patient view for seamless care, slow case resolution due to manual workflows causing delays, inefficient processes with tedious eligibility checks and order fulfillment, limited tracking with no real-time visibility into patient services, and integration gaps causing compliance challenges with external systems.
solution: Implemented Salesforce Health Cloud to create a comprehensive patient services platform featuring 360-degree patient view with unified profile management, automated care workflows and eligibility verification processes, Omni-Channel routing for optimized service resolution, FHIR-compliant data exchange for seamless integration with external healthcare systems, and real-time patient interaction capabilities.
outcomes: 38% faster patient onboarding with 360-degree patient view and automated workflows
43% increase in service efficiency through automated eligibility checks and benefits verification
35% improvement in service resolution time with Salesforce Omni-Channel routing
FHIR-compliant data exchange ensuring seamless integration with external healthcare systems
Enhanced patient care coordination through unified data visibility
Improved compliance with healthcare standards and regulations
businessValue: Significantly improved patient experience through faster onboarding and service resolution
Enhanced operational efficiency with 43% increase in service efficiency
Better compliance management with FHIR-compliant data exchange
Reduced manual workload through automated workflows and eligibility verification
Improved care coordination across the healthcare ecosystem
teamSize: Salesforce implementation team with healthcare domain expertise
